Wild Magnemite, Magneton, Magnezone, Steelix, Beldum, Metang, Metagross, Bronzor and Bronzong }} ===Description=== The Metal Coat Scale is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that can be first encountered in the [[Kanto]] Region, but that is first usable in the [[Johto]] Region. ===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix || [[File:Steelix.png|40px]] Steelix |- | [[File:Scyther.png|40px]] Scyther || [[File:Scizor.png|40px]] Scizor |} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
